name: Falling Grades, Rising Passion
description:
Falling Grades, Rising Passion is a visual novel/dating sim set within an elevator which has mysteriously stopped, giving you the opportunity to befriend and even fall in love with the other people stuck in there with you.

Made in Ren'Py for UA Game Dev's 2020 Valentine's mini jam.

The game is very incomplete, but check out these awesome UI icons we designed for it!

Credits

Jade Marmorstein: Art, Programming, Writing

Jonah Venglarcik: UI Art

Special thanks: Jessica and Joseph (no not those ones)
